overview: In a small town rocked by horrific murders, Kelly and Jason decide to stay safe, cozy up and watch a horror movie. Little do they know, they'll be starring in their own massacre when they are attacked by a masked figure in this modern homage to the classic slasher movies of the 80s and 90s.
tagline: A small town, a killer on the loose, a couple on a movie date: What could go wrong?
title: The Dollface Slasher
